structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Annual salary increments for deputy circuit clerks.
law.text: Deputy circuit clerks may receive annual salary increments for each year's services, subject to determination by the Supreme Court.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 407, sec. 3, effective July 1, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
